{{Infobox Berry |name = #22 Kelpsy |image = [[File:Kelpsy.png]] |caption = This Berry can be eaten as is or boiled to obtain an extract that adds a dash of flavor to food. |growtime = 1h 40m 0s |harvest = 21 berries |replant = 20% |points = 525 ||flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} === Description === '''Kelpsy''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Chesto]] and at least 1 [[Persim]]. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 4 mins || 33 mins 20 secs || 56 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 40 mins - 3 hours 20 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KelpsyTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KelpsyTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KelpsyTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} ==== Ripening Time with Modifiers ==== {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 hour 40 mins -
3 hours 20 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs -
2 hours 13 mins 20 secs || 14 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 44 mins 27 secs -
1 hour 28 mins 54 secs || 9 mulch |} === Flow Chart ===
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop || || Random

Drop |- | colspan="3" | ↓ || style="width: 40px;" | || ↓ |- | || [[File:Persim.png|20px]] [[Persim]] || colspan="2" | + || [[File:Chesto.png|20px]] [[Chesto]] |- | || || colspan="2" | ↓ |- | || || colspan="2" | [[File:Kelpsy.png|20px]] [[Kelpsy]] |} === Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Kelpsy berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Persim.png|30px]] [[Persim]] || || || [[File:Persim.png|30px]] [[Persim]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || || || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || |- | || [[File:Persim.png|30px]] [[Persim]] || || || [[File:Persim.png|30px]] [[Persim]] |} ==== Timing Table ==== {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Persim]] || - || - || - |- | [[Chesto]] || 40 secs until ripe || 26 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |} {{Berries}}
